phrs.translation: 瞎猜, 依推测的估计

sentences.sentence: The 30 percent figure may be no more than a guesstimate.
sentences.translation: 30%这一数字可能只是个大约的估计。

sentences.sentence: Can you give a guesstimate of how much it will cost to fix my car?
sentences.translation: 你能估计出修理我的车要花多少钱吗？

sentences.sentence: So supposed that this one — I'll just guesstimate, this one feels heavier.
sentences.translation: 假设是这个——我只是瞎猜，这个貌似重一些。
